title: The Wall Street Journal: Sonos confidentially files for IPO that could come this summer
text:
Sonos Inc., the Santa Barbara, Calif.-based wireless-speaker company, is preparing for an initial public offering that could come as soon as June or July, according to people familiar with the process.
Sonos, whose speaker system lets customers play music in every room of their house, has confidentially filed paperwork with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an IPO, these people said. This week, the company held an analyst day at the companyâ€™s offices in Santa Barbara in which its senior executives outlined its financials...
